list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, repo AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT id AS __value, name AS __text FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'unassigned' AS __value, 'Unassigned' AS __text ORDER BY __text

panels.title: Reviews Given / User / Week
panels.description: Requires PR review facts. If empty, reviews are not being ingested yet.

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfWeek(day) AS time, author_email AS user, sum(reviews_given_latest) AS reviews_given FROM ( SELECT m.repo_id, m.day AS day, m.author_email AS author_email, argMax(m.reviews_given, m.computed_at) AS reviews_given_latest FROM user_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(m.team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.repo_id, m.day, m.author_email ) GROUP BY time, user ORDER BY time ASC, reviews_given DESC

panels.title: PR Pickup Time p50 — hours
panels.description: PR opened → first comment/review/approval. Requires PR comment/review facts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_pickup_time_p50_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Time to First Review p50 — hours
panels.description: PR opened → first review. Requires PR review facts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_first_review_p50_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Review Reciprocity Score / User
panels.description: Score from 0 to 1 indicating how balanced a user's giving and receiving of reviews is.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, m.author_email AS metric, argMax(m.review_reciprocity, m.computed_at) AS value FROM user_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(m.team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Reviews Received / User / Week
panels.description: Total reviews received by the user on their own PRs.

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfWeek(day) AS time, author_email AS user, sum(reviews_received_latest) AS reviews_received FROM ( SELECT m.repo_id, m.day AS day, m.author_email AS author_email, argMax(m.reviews_received, m.computed_at) AS reviews_received_latest FROM user_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(m.team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.repo_id, m.day, m.author_email ) GROUP BY time, user ORDER BY time ASC, reviews_received DESC
